title: Linguistics Degree
alt: You'd think 'linguistics' would go to someone important in the field, but it's actually assigned to a random student in Ohio who barely graduated and then went into automotive marketing.
transcript:
[Hairbun and Megan, who is wearing a graduation cap, are standing on a platform with Ponytail and Cueball standing below. Hairbun is handing a roll to Megan.]
Hairbun: Congratulations on the degree! Your word is "Bassoon."
Ponytail: Oh nice! Not as cool as my "Jackalope," but still not bad.
Cueball: You all are lucky. I'm stuck with "Slurp."
[Caption below panel:]
Every linguistics degree comes with one word that you're put in charge of.
